articles.title: 60-year-old goes to mall to withdraw cash, ends up spending $2400 at beauty care store - AsiaOne
articles.description: She went to Waterway Point to withdraw money ahead of Hari Raya Aidilfitri celebrations but ended up $2,400 poorer, after buying a few skincare products. When Ms Nurhuda Halim's mother told her what had happened, the 23-year-old undergraduate was stunned. Her…
articles.content:

articles.author: Wayne Cole
articles.title: Asia shares cautious ahead of U.S. inflation test, Bitcoin slides - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares got off to a cautious start on Monday as investors anxiously awaited a key read on U.S. inflation this week for guidance on monetary policy, while Bitcoin took a hammering after China cracked down on mining and trading of the cryptocurrency.
articles.content: A man is reflected on a stock quotation board in Tokyo, Japan February 26, 2021. REUTERS/Kim Kyung-HoonAsian shares got off to a cautious start on Monday as investors anxiously awaited a key read on … [+3332 chars]

articles.title: All about this week’s Pacific super blood moon lunar eclipse - South China Morning Post
articles.description: With the moon at its closest point to Earth, and a full moon, Hong Kong will witness a total lunar eclipse on Wednesday. The spectacular sight will also be visible from East Asia to the US west coast if skies are clear.
